verbose_text: The rats were then sacrificed for the measurement of hippocampal malondialdehyde (MDA, a measure of lipid peroxidation) and glutathione (GSH, a measure of endogenous antioxidant capacity) levels, and for the expression of pro apoptotic factors [cytochrome c (Cyt c), caspase-9 and caspase-3].
